scripts.dependency-check: dependency-check ./package.json -e js,jsx --detective detective-cjs && dependency-check ./package.json -e js,jsx --detective detective-cjs --unused --no-dev
scripts.watch-js: NODE_ENV=development watchify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV development ] -t babelify sources/js/index.jsx --debug -p bundle-collapser/plugin -o client/js/main.js -v
scripts.build-js: NODE_ENV=production browserify -t babelify sources/js/index.jsx -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -p bundle-collapser/plugin -g uglifyify | uglifyjs -m -o client/js/main.min.js
scripts.build-sw-registrator: NODE_ENV=production browserify -t babelify sources/js/service-worker-registration.js -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -p bundle-collapser/plugin -g uglifyify | uglifyjs -m -o client/js/sw-registration.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-sw && npm run build-sw-registrator && npm run manifest
